# ggplot

## Why ggplot is awesome

The following boxplot shows how the distribution of city MPG (`cty`) varies by a type of cars (`class`).

```{r mpg-box, eval=T, echo=T}
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(mpg) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = class, y = cty, fill = class))
```
